# vasMerchants

**Instance Property**

A global list of merchants to use when reading loyalty cards.

## Declaration

```swift
var vasMerchants: [VASRequest.Merchant]
```

## Discussion

When you try to read a loyalty card from your [doc://com.apple.ProximityReader/documentation/ProximityReader/PaymentCardReaderSession] object, specify a custom [doc://com.apple.ProximityReader/documentation/ProximityReader/VASRequest] object to override this list.
title: vasMerchants
